short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get daily Islamic hadith directly from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily Islamic Hadith Extensions is a browser extension designed to provide users with a daily Hadith. It aims to bring the wisdom and teachings of the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) into your daily routine by displaying a new Hadith each day directly in your browser.
